main event: A family in Happy, Texas observed a round white light in the sky for about 15 seconds on 12 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was seen moving from east to west southwest at a 30-degree angle., The family did not use any optical aids for the observation., The object was described as being about the size of a nickel held at arm's length., Witnesses included a reliable farmer and his family, indicating a potential for multiple perspectives., The investigation concluded no physical evidence was found at the sighting location.
witness description: a family including children, very informed about UFO sightings
